name: Capital Ring link to Balham station

ai.summary: A very short, easy urban segment of the Capital Ring near Balham station in the UK. This 0.2 km stretch is best treated as a quick connector between nearby streets and green spaces, suitable for a brief stroll.
ai.terrain_summary: Urban terrain: sidewalks and short road sections, with nearby park paths. Mostly flat and well-maintained.
ai.safety_notes: Urban walk: stay to the sidewalk, obey pedestrian crossings, and be aware of traffic, cyclists, and other pedestrians. In low light, use reflective clothing and lights; consider weather conditions (rain, icy pavements) and keep valuables secure.
ai.best_seasons: All year round, with extra caution in winter and wet conditions.
